nodes.title: Fixed wrong item range removed notification.
Setting onItemClickListener in bind and null check in onClickListener
On a null object reference exception
Add Item callbacks for unbind and isRecyclable
Ensure correct position notifications when adding/removing groups in Section. Fixes #57
Suppress child updates in ExpandableGroup when collapsed. Fixes #56
Ensure UpdatingGroup registers itself as a change listener on its chi…
Use wildcard parameterized types for Group lists passed to the API
Ensure replacing a placeholder notifies correctly
Section and NestedGroup change notification fixes. Closes #46 and #48
Notify parentDataObserver with correct position. Closes #46
Fix Section addAll(position, groups) adapter notification
CircleCI: Copying unit test results for better reporting
Bump gradle and support lib versions
Update gradle regexes and move installation to one line
Enforce that you can't add null groups to the adapter
Animate the expandable group vector, why not!
Make UpdatingGroup take in a callback: Closes #22
Remove onClickListener from the GroupAdapter constructor
Adding removeFooter and removeHeader to section
Add syntax highlighting for code examples in Readme
Read build-tools and android version from build.gradle
Porting DraggableItem example to databinding examples
Add GroupieAdapter to use GroupieViewHolder by default
Using a buildFeatures in the  README example
#351 Fix the crash when dragging an item to the top/bottom of the list area
Making Kotlin extensions work with any class extending GroupieViewHolder
Update test libraries & refactor test codes
add NonNull annotation to some Item method
Fixed to to reset carousel position when CarouselItem is displayed again
BindableItem: add NonNull annotation to payloads argument of bind method
Fix outdated name in doc comment
Bring back old pre-2.7.0 methods and mark them as deprecated.
Add Example for How to Reorder Expandable Groups
Pass view attach/detach events to the Item
Update method names in GroupAdapter and add javadoc to better document what they do
Issue #288 Use hasSameContentAs for comparing Item equality
DiffTask javadoc: fix AsyncDiffUtil#calculateDiff method signature
library-databinding: remove duplicate dependency from build.gradle
Allow specifying false for DiffUtil detect moves
Bug #256 Add item at position for ExpandableGroup
Bug #261 - UpdateAsync does not register GroupDataObservers
Bug #210 - Section should register GroupDataObserver for headers and footers
Create a method to set expanded value to an `ExpandableGroup`
Add a method to obtain the child count
Use `Item.isSameAs()` method instead to reimplement it into `UpdatingCallback`
Add getViewType method to Item class
Implement LifecycleOwner interface in ViewHolder to work with livedata
Fix a bug that ExpandableGroup#getPosition returns wrong index
Support stable ids by returning item id, fixes #214
Migration to AndroidX, target API 28, update kotlin to 1.2.71, support gradle plugin 3.2 and update gradle to 4.10.2
Add ability to pass your own DiffResult in `update()` method
Modified DiffTask to relay caught exceptions to main thread
Introduced new API for async adapter updates
adding group and section plus/minus assign operators
Fix getAdapterPosition returning 0 when group not found
Proposal for adding change payloads to Section diffing. Needs tests
Fix updating a section which has headers #151
Fixes #118 full bleed item not being full bleed
Make Section updating and deprecate UpdatingGroup.
Fixed addAll function of ExpandableGroup and allow to initial ExpandableGroup with isExpanded property
Annotate everything with NonNull / Nullable for Kotlin (#94)
Convert vanilla example project to Kotlin & Android extensions
[WIP] Support Groupie with AND without data binding #16

Adds support for item long click listeners
